item.title: Donator rank yell
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

You should just delete:

if (playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Player] "; }

because if you leave normal players out it is assumed that they are just a player when they yell with nothing next to their name. And also, it is saying player because they have a donator rank and player rights, so the game is using the player rights rank over the donator rank.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator rank yell
item.dc:creator: @_Dj_Bigdadd `Dj_Bigdadd`
item.description:
@_Dj_Bigdadd wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (donator == 1) { 
                titles = "[Donator]";
            }

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@cya@[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@yel@[Admin] ";
            }

	if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }

            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }[/code]

alright well when a donator yells it only says player i want it to say donator but some reason it wont work im obviously doing something wrong or missing something can anyone help?

Read full topic
